settings.clear-history-description: Clear the game history in score board.
settings.removed-history: The player history has been removed.

inst.description: Tic Tac Toe is a classic strategy game played on a 3x3 grid. Two players take turns marking spaces with their symbols (X and O). The first player to get three of their marks in a row wins!
inst.quick-tip-description: Control the center square for better winning chances!
inst.take-turns-description: Players alternate placing their marks (X or O) on empty squares of the 3x3 grid.
inst.three-row-description: Win by getting three of your marks in a row - horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
inst.draw-game-description: If all squares are filled and no player has three in a row, the game ends in a draw.
inst.arrow-controls-description: Navigate the game board with the control arrows.
inst.selection-button-description: Place your mark on selected square.
inst.control-center-description: The center square gives you the most winning opportunities.
inst.block-description: Always prevent your opponent from getting three in a row.
inst.fork-description: Set up multiple winning opportunities at once.
inst.corner-description: Corners are the second-best positions after the center.
